title: Understanding Auto Fill Options
text: The Auto Fill Options menu in spreadsheet software provides several choices to help you quickly fill cells with data or formatting. Can you think of some common tasks you might want to perform when filling cells?

title: Exploring the Options
text: Consider what you might want to do if you have a series of numbers or dates. What options would help you continue that series automatically?

hintAnswer: copy cells, fill series, fill formatting only, fill without formatting, fill months
title: Listing the Options
text: Try listing the options available on the Auto Fill Options menu. Think about tasks like copying data, continuing a series, or applying formatting.
